text: bRuhaqspati#rdEqvAnA$M puqrOhi#taq AsIq-cCaNDAqmarkAq-vasu#rANAqM brahma#N vantO dEqvA Asaqn brahma#N vaqntO&su#rAqstE$(1q) &nyO$&nyaM nASa#knuva-nnaqBiBa#vituqM tE dEqvAH SaNDAqmarkAq-vupA#mantrayantaq tA va#brUtAqM ~Mvara#M ~MvRuNAvahaiq grahA#vEqva nAqvatrApi# gRuhyEtAqmitiq tAByA#mEqtau SuqkrAmaqnthinA#-vagRuhNaqn tatO# dEqvA aBa#vaqn parA&su#rAq yasyaiqvaM ~MviqduSha#H SuqkrAmaqnthinau# gRuqhyEtEq Ba#vatyAqtmanAq parA$- [  ] 42
